Title: Do You Remember That Night?
Description: ['Animated music videos for songs from the third 10th anniversary album "Do You Remember That Night?" by Sugiurumn, featuring a variety of accompanying artists. The album is a compilation of tracks from his previous discography, with ', That Night feat. Tomomi Ukumori, ' as the only original song.']
Related: ['Adaptation: Yondemasu yo, Azazel-san.', 'Side story: Yondemasu yo, Azazel-san.', 'Sequel: Yondemasu yo, Azazel-san. Z']
